Specific duration limit: Duration may not exceed two years
Wage threshold: n/a
Notice requirem
laws.suggestion: Modify the non-compete clause to include specific, reasonable limitations, such as: "Employee agrees not to engage in competing activities within a 50-mile radius of South Dakota for a period of 6 months following termination." This revised language complies with South Dakota's reasonableness requirement for non-compete agreements. Ensure the clause is narrowly tailored to protect legitimate business interests.

review_notes.next_steps: Verify statute citations and effective dates
